Tool

NameExport GeoTIFF
ID2
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2007
Specificationgrid

Description

The "GDAL GeoTIFF Export" module exports one or more grids to a Geocoded Tagged Image File Format using the "Geospatial Data Abstraction Library" (GDAL) by Frank Warmerdam. For more information have a look at the GDAL homepage: http://www.gdal.org

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid(s) Grid list (input)GRIDSThe SAGA grids to be exported.
Options
FileFile pathFILEThe GeoTIFF File to be created.
Creation OptionsTextOPTIONSA space separated list of key-value pairs (K=V).
